description:
Desperate for money, the wise Wolf proposes a dangerous new plan.  But even more dangerous are Holo`s emotions, when Lawrence is being rather dense...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Weisheiten des Wolfs und die süßen Worte des Händlers
Ookami no Chie to Shounin no Kuchiguruma
Wisdom of a Wolf and Smooth Talk of a Merchant
狼の知恵と商人の口車
